newsitem.title: USA: JMC Group signs marketing contracts. [CORRECTED]
newsitem.headline: JMC Group signs marketing contracts. [CORRECTED]

text.p: JMC Group Inc said it had signed contracts to provide investment marketing services to a new bank holding company client, Horizon Bancorp Inc, and had renewed a contract with a bank client.
The company said in a statement late on Monday it had signed a products and services contract with Horizon Bancorp. (Deletes erroneous reference to Horizon as a Beckley, W.Va., holding company.)

According to James K. Mitchell, chairman and chief executive of JMCG, the board of directors of Horizon has approved contracts with James Mitchell & Co, a wholly owned subsidiary of JMCG, to market mutual funds, annuities, insurance products and brokerage services to their branch customers.
JMCG also announced the renewal of a contract to provide similar products and services to River City Bank, headquartered in Sacramento, Calif.
